subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|i}} - two parallel lines. Compare with {{l|zh|一}}, one line meaning one, {{l|zh|三}}, three lines meaning three, and {{l|zh|亖}}, four lines meaning four. {{zh-etym-double|一|one}}.
